Package game

Class ZombieLeg

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
game.Limb
game.ZombieLeg
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon, ItemInterface
public class ZombieLeg
extends Limb
implements edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon
A Zombie's Leg. This class models a Zombie's leg, as a Limb, that can be used as a Weapon when detached from the host Zombie. Provides methods to drop the ZombieLeg and get its damage and description when wielded as a simple club.
Author:
Isaac Lee Kian Min
